info.title: National Registry
info.description: The API retrieves information stored about individuals

get.summary: Get the basic information for individual.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: National id of the individual being fetched.

200.description: The basic information for the particular individual.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: No individual exists with that national id.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

200.description: The birthplace information.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

get.summary: Get all of the available gender and cohabition codes.

parameters.name: tungumal
parameters.description: Text language. Not required. Defaults to Icelandic.

200.description: List of the available gender and cohabition codes.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

500.description: There was an error on the server side.

1.skilgreining: Íslendingur með lögheimili erlendis; í hjúskap með útlendingi sem ekki er á skrá
